name: Falling Block Puzzle Game
description:
Falling Block Puzzle!!
This app is similar to Tetris, but different.
You should enjoy.
It is very easy to operate.

*** Features ***
- Very Easy to Operate
- Super Rotation
- Hold
- Next Block

*** How to Use ***
- Tap = Rotation
- Up Flick = Hold
- Down Flick = Drop
- Drag = Move
